title: Portal 2
description: Sequel to the acclaimed Portal (2007), Portal 2 pits the protagonist of the original game, Chell, and her new robot friend, Wheatley, against more puzzles conceived by GLaDOS, an A.I. with the sole purpose of testing the Portal Gun's mechanics and taking revenge on Chell for the events of Portal. As a result of several interactions and revelations, Chell once again pushes to escape Aperture Science Labs.

localized_description.text: Sequel to the acclaimed Portal (2007), Portal 2 pits the protagonist of the original game, Chell, and her new robot friend, Wheatley, against more puzzles conceived by GLaDOS, an A.I. with the sole purpose of testing the Portal Gun's mechanics and taking revenge on Chell for the events of Portal. As a result of several interactions and revelations, Chell once again pushes to escape Aperture Science Labs.

Portal 2 draws from the award-winning formula of innovative gameplay, story, and music that earned the original Portal over 70 industry accolades and created a cult following.
 
 										The single-player portion of Portal 2 introduces a cast of dynamic new characters, a host of fresh puzzle elements, and a much larger set of devious test chambers. Players will explore never-before-seen areas of the Aperture Science Labs and be reunited with GLaDOS, the occasionally murderous computer companion who guided them through the original game.
 										
 										The game’s two-player cooperative mode features its own entirely separate campaign with a unique story, test chambers, and two new player characters. This new mode forces players to reconsider everything they thought they knew about portals. Success will require them to not just act cooperatively, but to think cooperatively.
 										
 										 Product Features 
 										   Extensive single player:  Featuring next generation gameplay and a wildly-engrossing story.
 										   Complete two-person co-op:  Multiplayer game featuring its own dedicated story, characters, and gameplay.
 										   Advanced physics:  Allows for the creation of a whole new range of interesting challenges, producing a much larger but not harder game.
 										   Original music. 
 										   Massive sequel:  The original Portal was named 2007's Game of the Year by over 30 publications worldwide. 
 										   Editing Tools:  Portal 2 editing tools will be included.

Portal 2 continúa con esa fórmula ganadora consistente en una innovadora mecánica de juego, historia y música que condujeron al Portal original a ganar más de 70 galardones y lo convirtieron en un nuevo mito de la industria.
 
 										En el modo de un jugador de Portal 2 conoceremos a un nuevo elenco de personajes, gran cantidad de innovadores puzles y un número mucho mayor de enrevesadas salas de pruebas. Los jugadores podrán explorar zonas de Aperture Science Labs nunca vistas anteriormente y volverán a encontrarse a GLaDOS, ese compañero computerizado, y en ocasiones con tendencias asesinas, que los guio a lo largo del juego original.
 										
 										El modo cooperativo para dos jugadores tiene su propia campaña totalmente independiente, con una historia única, salas de pruebas y dos nuevos personajes con los que podremos jugar. Este nuevo modo obliga a los jugadores a reconsiderar todo lo que creían saber acerca de los portales. Para tener éxito no solo deberán trabajar codo con codo, sino que también tendrán que pensar de forma cooperativa.
 										
 										 Características principales 
 										   Amplio modo de un jugador:  Con una mecánica de juego de nueva generación y una historia increíblemente fascinante.
 										   Cooperativo para dos jugadores:  El modo multijugador dispone de su propia historia, personajes y mecánica de juego.
 										   Física avanzada:  Permite la creación de nuevos e interesantes desafíos para disfrutar de un juego mucho más largo pero no más difícil.
 										   Música original. 
 										   Una gran secuela:  El Portal original fue elegido «Juego del Año 2007» por más de 30 publicaciones de todo el mundo. 
 										   Herramientas de edición:  Se incluirán las herramientas de edición para Portal 2.

Portal 2 nous vient tout droit du jeu original et culte Portal, primé à plus de 70 reprises pour sa jouabilité, son scénario et sa musique.
 
 La partie solo de Portal 2 présente un ensemble de nouveaux personnages, de nouveaux éléments de casse-têtes et de nouvelles chambres de test plus vastes. Parcourez des pans inconnus des laboratoires d'Aperture Science et retrouvez GLaDOS, l'ordinateur maléfique du jeu original.
 
 Le mode coopératif à deux comprend une campagne autonome avec sa propre histoire, des chambres de test inédites et deux nouveaux personnages. Ce nouveau mode va remettre en question vos connaissances des portails. Non seulement vous devrez agir à deux, mais vous devrez aussi penser à deux.
 
  Caractéristiques du jeu 
    Mode solo :  une jouabilité nouvelle génération et une histoire captivante.
    Mode coopératif à deux :  un mode multijoueur avec sa propre histoire, deux nouveaux personnages et une nouvelle jouabilité.
    Modèles physiques avancés :  les nouveaux modèles permettent la création de nouvelles épreuves dans un environnement plus vaste et plus complexe.
    Bande-son originale. 
    Suite d'un jeu incontournable :  le jeu Portal original a été primé meilleur jeu de l'année 2007 par plus de 30 parutions dans le monde entier.
    Outils d'édition :  des outils pour créer vos propres chambres de test sont inclus.

Portal 2 verfeinert die preisgekrönte Mischung aus innovativem Spielgeschehen, Story und Musik, die dem Originalspiel Portal über 70 Auszeichnungen eingebracht hat und einen wahren Kult auslöste.
 
 										Der Einzelspielermodus von Portal 2 präsentiert einige neue und dynamische Charaktere, mehrere neue Puzzle-Elemente und eine Vielzahl neuer hinterhältiger Testkammern. Die Spieler erkunden bislang unbekannte Bereiche der Aperture Science Laboratorien, natürlich wieder mit der bisweilen mörderischen Hilfe von GLaDOS, dem Computerbegleiter aus dem Originalspiel.
 										
 										Der Zwei-Spieler-Koop-Modus bietet zudem eine vollkommen separate Kampagne mit einer einzigartigen Geschichte, weiteren Testkammern und zwei neuen Spielcharakteren. Dieser neue Modus zwingt Spieler dazu, alles zu überdenken, was sie bezüglich Portalen zu wissen glaubten. Erfolg setzt nicht nur kooperative Aktionen voraus, sondern auch kooperatives Denken.
 										
 										 Produkteigenschaften 
 										   Umfangreicher Einzelspielermodus:  Spielgeschehen der nächsten Generation mit einer fesselnden Geschichte.
 										   Kompletter Zwei-Spieler-Koop-Modus:  Mehrspielermodus mit eigener Geschichte, Charakteren und Spielmechanik.
 										   Fortschrittliche Physik:  Vollkommen neue und interessante Herausforderungen in einem viel intensiveren Spiel, ohne dabei den Schwierigkeitsgrad zu heben.
 										   Originalmusik. 
 										   Großartige Fortsetzung:  Das Originalspiel wurde 2007 weltweit von über 30 Publikationen zum Spiel des Jahres gekürt. 
 										   Editor:  Portal-2-Editor enthalten.

O Portal 2 é baseado na premiada fórmula de jogabilidade, história e música inovadoras que garantiu ao Portal original mais de 70 prémios e criou um culto entre os fãs.
 
 										A porção de um jogador de Portal 2 introduz um elenco de novas personagens dinâmicas, novos elementos de puzzle e um conjunto muito maior de tortuosas câmaras de teste. Os jogadores irão explorar áreas nunca antes vistas dos Laboratórios da Aperture Science e serão reunidos com GLaDOS, o computador ocasionalmente homicida que os guiou através do jogo original.
 										
 										O modo cooperativo de dois jogadores apresenta a sua própria campanha com uma história e câmaras de teste únicas e duas novas personagens jogáveis. Este novo modo força os jogadores a pôr em causa tudo aquilo que pensavam saber acerca dos portais. O sucesso irá não só requerer que os jogadores ajam cooperativamente, mas também que pensem cooperativamente.
 										
 										 Características do produto 
 										   Modo de um jogador extensivo:  Com jogabilidade de próxima geração e uma história fascinante.
 										   Modo cooperativo completo para duas pessoas:  Modo multijogador com a sua própria história, personagens e jogabilidade dedicadas.
 										   Física avançada:  Permite a criação de todo um novo conjunto de interessantes desafios, produzindo um jogo muito maior, sem aumentar a sua dificuldade.
 										   Música original. 
 										   Sequela massiva:  O Portal original foi nomeado Jogo do Ano em 2007 por mais de 30 publicações em todo o mundo. 
 										    Ferramentas de edição:  As ferramentas de edição do Portal 2 estão incluídas.

Portal 2 følger den prisvindende opskrift med nyskabende spilindhold, handling og musik, som gjorde, at det originale Portal vandt over 70 priser og fik en dedikeret tilhængerskare.
 
 										Singleplayerdelen af Portal 2 introducerer en række nye dynamiske karakterer, en stribe nye puzzleelementer og et meget større sæt af lumske testkamre. Spillere udforsker hidtil usete områder i Aperture Science Labs og møder endnu en gang GLaDOS, den til tider morderiske computerfølgesvend, som guidede dem igennem det originale spil.
 										
 										Spillets co-op-tilstand for to spillere har sin helt egen separate kampagne med en unik handling, testkamre og to nye spillerkarakterer. Den nye tilstand tvinger spillere til at tage alt, hvad de ved om portaler, op til fornyet overvejelse. Deres succes er afhængig af, at de ikke blot arbejder sammen, men også tænker sammen.
 										
 										 Produktet indeholder: 
 										   Omfattende singleplayer:  Med næstegenerationsgameplay og opslugende handling.
 										   Co-op for to spillere:  Multiplayerspil med sin egen dedikerede handling, karakterbesætning og eget gameplay.
 										   Avanceret fysik:  Gør det muligt at skabe et helt nyt udvalg af spændende udfordringer, som gør spillet meget større, men ikke sværere.
 										   Original musik. 
 										   En gigantisk efterfølger:  Det originale Portal blev kåret som årets spil i 2007 af over 30 publikationer verden over. 
 										   Redigeringsværktøjer:  Redigeringsværktøjerne fra Portal 2 følger med.

Portal 2 attinge dalla premiata formula di innovativa giocabilità, storia e musica che è valsa al primo Portal oltre 70 premi di settore e che ha generato un culto.
 
 										La porzione da giocatore singolo di Portal 2 introduce un cast di nuovi e coinvolgenti personaggi, una serie di enigmi originali e un'ancora più lunga sfilza di tortuose camere di test. I giocatori esploreranno aree dei Laboratori di Aperture Science mai viste prima e si riuniranno a GLaDOS, il computer saltuariamente omicida che li guidò attraverso il primo gioco.
 										
 										La modalità cooperativa a due giocatori offre una campagna unica dotata di una trama completamente separata da quella originale, con nuove camere di test e due nuovi personaggi giocabili. Questa nuova modalità obbliga i giocatori a riconsiderare tutto ciò che credevano di conoscere riguardo i portali. Il successo richiederà sia di agire che di pensare cooperativamente.
 										
 										 Caratteristiche del prodotto 
 										   Ampia modalità a giocatore singolo:  con giocabilità di nuova generazione e storia ferocemente avvincente.
 										   Completa modalità cooperativa a due giocatori:  modalità multigiocatore dotata di storia, personaggi e giocabiltà originali.
 										   Sistema fisico avanzato:  permette la creazione di una nuova serie di sfide, rendendo il gioco più vasto ma non più difficile.
 										   Musica originale. 
 										   Grandioso seguito:  il primo Portal è stato nominato gioco dell'anno del 2007 da oltre 30 periodici in tutto il mondo. 
 										   Strumenti di editing:  Portal 2 includerà gli strumenti di editing.

《传送门2》用创新的游戏内容、故事以及最初《传送门》那赢得超过 70 项以上业界奖项般的配乐打造出另一个大奖赢家的继承者。本作是一款以Source引擎制作的第一人称解密游戏，是2007年发售的同名游戏的续作。

《传送门2》的单人游戏部分带来充满活力的新角色、一大堆新鲜的解谜元素，以及更大、更加曲折的试验室。玩家将可以于前所未见的光圈科技实验室中探索，并且与在原游戏中引导你，偶尔想要把你杀掉的电脑陪伴者 GLaDOS 重逢。游戏共有总计九章的单人模式以及全新的五章合作通关（co-op）模式。新的道具将会挡住去路或帮助玩家前进，但最重要的依然是玩家手中的那把Portal Gun。

本游戏的双人合作模式将有其独立的战役内容，包含独特的故事、试验室，以及两名新的玩家角色。这项新的游戏模式让玩家必须重新思考所有他们在《传送门》中所了解到的事实。想要过关不只要一起行动，还必须一起思考。

brief: Sequel to the acclaimed Portal (2007), Portal 2 pits the protagonist of the original game, Chell, and her new robot friend, Wheatley, against more puzzles conceived by GLaDOS, an A.I. with the sole purpose of testing the Portal Gun's mechanics and taking revenge on Chell for the events of Portal. As a result of several interactions and revelations, Chell once again pushes to escape Aperture Science Labs.

title: Don't Starve Together

Explore Together   
 Discover and explore a massive procedurally generated and biome-rich world with countless resources and threats. Whether you stick to the surface world, go spelunking in the caves, dive deeper into the Ancient Archive, or set sail for the Lunar islands, it will be a long time before you run out of things to do.
 
  Fight Together   
 Seasonal bosses, wandering menaces, lurking shadow creatures, and plenty of flora and fauna ready to turn you into a spooky ghost.
 
  Farm Together   
 Plow fields and sow seeds to grow the farm of your dreams. Tend to your crops to help your fellow survivors stay fed and ready for the challenges to come.
 
  Build Together   
 Protect yourself, your friends, and everything you have managed to gather, because you can be sure, somebody or something is going to want it back.
 
  About the Game  
 Fight, Farm, Build and Explore Together in the standalone multiplayer expansion to the uncompromising wilderness survival game, Don't Starve.
 
 Enter a strange and unexplored world full of odd creatures, hidden dangers, and ancient secrets. Gather resources to craft items and build structures that match your survival style. Play your way as you unravel the mysteries of "The Constant".
 
 Cooperate with your friends in a private game, or find new friends online. Work with other players to survive the harsh environment, or strike out on your own.
 
 Do whatever it takes, but most importantly, Don't Starve.

title: Divinity: Original Sin II
description:
Divinity: Original Sin II is a single- and multiplayer top-down, party-based role-playing game with pen & paper RPG-like levels of freedom. It features turn-based combat, a strong focus on systematic gameplay and a well-grounded narrative.

The Divine is dead. The Void approaches. And the powers lying dormant within you are soon to awaken. The battle for Divinity has begun. Choose wisely and trust sparingly; darkness lurks within every heart.

title: Outer Wilds
description:
Outer Wilds再添一项大奖，被Giant Bomb、Polygon、Eurogamer和The Guardian评为“2019年度游戏”！备受赞誉、屡获大奖的Outer Wilds是一款开放世界冒险类游戏，游戏背景是一个困在无尽的时间循环之中的太阳系。

欢迎加入太空计划！
你是 Outer Wilds 冒险的最新成员，这个新手太空计划是为了在一个奇怪的、不断演变的太阳系中寻找答案。

太阳系的奥秘...
不祥的黑棘星中心潜伏着什么？月球上的外星人遗迹是谁建造的？能否停止无尽的时间循环？答案在最危险的太空区域等待着你。

一个随时间改变的世界
Outer Wilds 的星球上有许多随时间改变的隐秘地点。在某个地下城市被沙土吞噬之前拜访它，或在某个星球于你脚下破碎时探索其表面。每个秘密都受到危险环境和自然灾难的保护。

带上你的星际徒步装备！
系好你的徒步靴、检查你的氧气量并准备好进入太空冒险。使用各种独特的小设备探查周围环境、追踪神秘信号、破译古老的外星文字以及烤出完美的棉花糖。

系好你的徒步靴、检查你的氧气量并准备好进入太空冒险。使用各种独特的小设备探查周围环境、追踪神秘信号、破译古老的外星文字以及烤出完美的棉花糖。

title: Papers, Please
description:
The communist state of Arstotzka has just ended a 6-year war with neighboring Kolechia and reclaimed its rightful half of the border town, Grestin. Your job as immigration inspector is to control the flow of people entering the Arstotzkan side of Grestin from Kolechia. Among the throngs of immigrants and visitors looking for work are hidden smugglers, spies, and terrorists. Using only the documents provided by travelers and the Ministry of Admission's primitive inspect, search, and fingerprint systems you must decide who can enter Arstotzka and who will be turned away or arrested.

The gameplay of Papers, Please focuses on the work life of an immigration inspector at a border checkpoint for the fictitious Eastern Bloc country of Arstotzka. The player inspects would-be immigrants' documents and uses a sparse array of tools to determine whether the papers are in order for the purpose of keeping spies, smugglers and other unwanted individuals out of the country. At the end of each in-game day, the player earns money based on how many immigrants they processed less any penalties for mistakes, and then must decide on a simple budget to spend that money on rent, food, heat, and other necessities in low-class housing for themselves and their family. As relations between Arstotzka and nearby countries deteriorate due to multiple terrorist attacks, each day introduces a new set of rules for immigration based on the game's story, such as denying citizens of specific countries or demanding more exacting identification from citizens. The player may be challenged with moral dilemmas and social engineering as the game progresses; such as allowing the supposed spouse of one immigrant through despite them lacking complete papers, even though they may be planning to attack your fellow guards.
A mysterious anti-government organisation also appears, with several of its members appearing in the checkpoint, giving the inspector orders on what to do in order to help the organisation bring down the government and establish a new one; the player can choose whether or not to help this organisation.
The game has a scripted story mode with multiple possible endings depending on the player's previous actions, as well as an unlockable, randomized endless-play mode.
Papers, Please has been praised by the sense of immersion provided by the game mechanics, and the intense emotional reaction.[12] CBC News' Jonathan Ore called Papers, Please a "nerve-racking sleuthing game with relentless pacing and dozens of compelling characters - all from a desk job"

title: The Sims 3
description:
In The Sims 3, you can create Sims with unique personalities, fulfill their desires, and control their lives within a customizable living neighborhood. Unlock all-new Karma Powers and unleash them on your Sims: help your Sim get lucky with the power of "love connector", bless them with the power of "age defiler" or "instant beauty" or curse them with an "instant enemy". Use these powers wisely, because they may have unexpected results! As you guide your Sims through life, you can complete challenges to unlock additional items, new buildings and landmarks.

Create over a million unique Sims and control their lives. Customize everything from their appearances, to their personalities and even the home of their dreams. Then, send your Sims out to explore new locations around town and to meet other Sims in the neighborhood. With all-new quick challenges and rewarding game play, The Sims 3 gives you the freedom to choose whether (or not!) to fulfill your Sims’ destinies and make their wishes come true.

Powerful character design tools let you make exactly who you want. Robust building features allow for precise control over your Sims' home. And your Sims can explore a huge neighborhood to their heart’s content. Day or night, work or play, the world is your Sims' oyster.

It’s easy and fun to make your unique Sims look just right. From the face and body shaping options to the vast and ever-growing range of clothing choices to the intriguing personality types, you can create the character of your dreams… or even make yourself!

Sims can roam freely throughout the town. Visit the local bistro, check out the new nightclub, get a few reps in at the gym, whatever strikes your Sims' fancy is theirs to pursue… and they’ll never have to wait in line!

Whether or not you believe in destiny, you can help your Sims achieve their dreams. During their lifetimes, Sims will want different things based on their individual personality traits. Fulfilling these desires gets you points to spend purchasing new items for your Sims. And it’ll give you a nice warm feeling, too.

title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33
description:
Lead the members of Expedition 33 on their quest to destroy the Paintress so that she can never paint death again. Explore a world of wonders inspired by Belle Époque France and battle unique enemies in this turn-based RPG with real-time mechanics.

“Year by year, She erases us.”

Once a year, the Paintress wakes and paints upon her monolith. Paints her cursed number. And everyone of that age turns to smoke and fades away. Year by year, that number ticks down and more of us are erased. Tomorrow she’ll wake and paint “33.” And tomorrow we depart on our final mission - Destroy the Paintress, so she can never paint death again.

We are Expedition 33.

社区活动      
 
 
  数字豪华版      
  豪华版包括以下内容：  
    《光与影：33号远征队》本体游戏
    “花儿”套装 - 六身装束和发型，灵感源自卢明的花儿；以及六身“抹煞”主题的装束，六个可操控角色，一人一身。
    “光” - 玛埃尔装束
    “影” - 古斯塔夫装束
   
 
  关于游戏      
    
 每一年，沉睡的绘母都会苏醒一次，在纪石上画下一个新的数字，所有年龄大于该数字的人，都会烟消云散。石头上的数字逐年变小，生者逐年减少。明天，她将再次醒来，画上数字“33”。明天，我们也将启程，执行最后的任务——消灭绘母，让她无法继续绘就死亡。
 
 我们是第33号远征队。
 
 《光与影：33号远征队》这款回合制角色扮演游戏采用了特别的即时机制，开创了品类先河，战斗将带来前所未有的沉浸体验，必定让玩家欲罢不能。探索奇妙世界，感受法兰西19世纪末“美好年代”时期的风采，与强大的敌人展开殊死战斗。
 
      
    
 在这款开拓创新的日式角色扮演游戏中，即时行动将令回合制战斗更加激烈。根据自己的游戏风格，调整装备、属性、技能以及角色之间的协同配合，为你的远征队员设计只属于你的构筑。挑战瞬息万变的战斗系统：看准时机及时闪避、格挡、反击，掌握攻击节奏，发动连锁打击，善用自由瞄准系统，精准打击敌人的弱点部位。
 
      
    
 大家只剩下一年的寿命，跟随古斯塔夫、玛埃尔以及其他远征队员背水一战，踏上征途，无论如何都要打破绘母的死亡循环。追寻其他远征队的踪迹，了解他们最后的命运。逐渐认识33号远征队的成员，看他们最终能够携手并进，战胜绝望的命运。
 
      
    
 探索迷人的世界，面对奇形怪状的敌人。走过壮美的土地，从千面之岛到遗落的战场，一路发掘秘密和隐蔽的任务。结识传奇生物，结交忠诚的战友，招募特殊的伙伴，发现全新的跋涉方式，探索世界地图的秘密区域。
 
 感受Sandfall Interactive完全通过Unreal Engine 5打造的处女作，欣赏让人叹为观止的精美画面和动人心弦的原声音轨。

數位豪華版      
  豪華版包含：  
    《光與影：33號遠征隊》主遊戲
    「綴花」系列 - 六款服裝和髮型，設計靈感源自盧明城的花朵；另附六款「抹煞」服裝變體，每位可玩角色各一。
    「光」 - 瑪艾兒的自訂服裝
    「影」- 古斯塔夫的自訂服裝
   
 
  關於此遊戲      
    
 每一年的那一天，繪母都會從睡夢中甦醒，在巨石上畫出新的數字。每一年的那一天，任何年齡大於該數字的人，全部都會灰飛煙滅。一年又一年，巨石上那可憎的數字逐漸變小，我們的人民也越來越少。明天，她將再次甦醒，畫下「33」。而明天，我們也將踏上最後的任務：殺了繪母，阻止她揮動死亡的筆刷。
 
 我們就是33號遠征隊。
 
 《光與影：33號遠征隊》是一款別具新意的RPG遊戲，回合制玩法搭配獨特即時機制，戰鬥臨場感加倍，絕對會讓玩家欲罷不能。探索法國「美好年代」風格的世界，與可畏強敵展開殊死決戰。
 
      
    
 劃時代的JRPG大作，即時動作元素為回合制戰鬥更添精彩。根據你的遊玩風格，自由調整遠征隊員的裝備、屬性、技能，衡量角色間激盪出的火花，打造獨一無二的遠征隊伍。在戰鬥中即時閃避、格擋和反擊，體驗動態新境界，掌握戰鬥節奏就能發動連擊，還能用自由瞄準系統來專攻敵人弱點。
 
      
    
 這支遠征隊只剩下一年壽命，加入古斯塔夫、瑪艾兒等人的行列，奮不顧身踏上征途，打破繪母的死亡輪迴。跟隨已逝遠征隊員的腳步，揭露他們最後的命運。隨著旅途開展，深入認識33號遠征隊的成員，一起對抗不可能的命運，在絕望中體會友誼的真諦。
 
      
    
 迷人國度裡遍布超乎想像的對手，處處都是令人屏息的壯麗景致。踏上旅途，從千面之島到遺落戰場，沿途發掘各種祕密和隱藏任務。邂逅傳奇生物、結識忠誠盟友、集結有個性的夥伴，還能解鎖全新旅行方式，探索世界地圖中不為人知的天涯海角。
 
 體驗Sandfall Interactive開發的首款遊戲，本作完全由Unreal Engine 5打造，視覺效果淋漓盡致，原聲配樂感人至深。

Digital Deluxe Edition      The Deluxe Edition includes: 
   Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Base Game
   The “Flowers” Collection - Six outfits and hairstyles inspired by the Flowers of Lumière, along with six additional “Gommage” outfit variations. One for each playable character.
   “Clair” - A custom outfit for Maelle
   “Obscur” - A custom outfit for Gustave  
 
  About the Game          Once a year, the Paintress wakes and paints upon her monolith. Paints her cursed number. And everyone past that age turns to smoke and fades away. Year by year, that number ticks down and more of us are erased. Tomorrow she’ll wake and paint “33.” And tomorrow we depart on our final mission - Destroy the Paintress, so she can never paint death again. 
  
  We are Expedition 33.
  
  Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 is a ground-breaking turn-based RPG with unique real-time mechanics, making battles more immersive and addictive than ever. Explore a fantasy world inspired by Belle Époque France in which you battle devastating enemies.
  
          In this evolution of JRPGs, real-time actions enhance the heart of turn-based combat. Craft unique builds for your Expeditioners that fit your playstyle via gear, stats, skills, and character synergies. Open an active dimension in combat - dodge, parry, and counter in real time, chain combos by mastering attack rhythms, and target enemy weak points using a free aim system. 
  
          With only one year left to live, join Gustave, Maelle, and their fellow Expeditioners as they embark upon a desperate quest to break the Paintress’ cycle of death. Follow the trail of previous expeditions and discover their fate. Get to know the members of Expedition 33 as they learn to work together against impossible odds.
  
          Explore an enchanting realm populated by surreal adversaries. Wander through breathtaking landscapes, from the Island of Visages to the Forgotten Battlefield, discovering secrets and hidden quests along the way. Find allies of fortune in creatures of legend. Recruit special companions to access new travel methods and discover secret areas in the World Map.
  
  Experience the debut game from Sandfall Interactive, fully realized in Unreal Engine 5 with stunning graphics and a heartbreaking soundtrack.

Digital Deluxe Edition      La edición Deluxe incluye lo siguiente: 
   El juego base Clair Obscur: Expedition 33.
   La colección Flores: seis atuendos y peinados, inspirados en las flores de Lumière, además de seis atuendos adicionales de estilo Gommage (uno por cada personaje jugable).
   Clair: un atuendo personalizado para Maelle.
   Obscur: un atuendo personalizado para Gustave.  
 
  Acerca del juego      
    
 Una vez al año, la Peintresse se despierta y pinta un número en el Monolito. Un número maldito. Todas las personas cuya edad es mayor que ese número se convierten de pronto en humo, esfumándose en el aire. Año tras año, el número baja y, con él, nuestras filas acaban borradas. Mañana, se despertará y pintará el 33. Y, mañana, nosotros partiremos en nuestra última misión: destruir a la Peintresse para que no vuelva a pintar la muerte nunca más.
 
 Somos la expedición 33.
 
 Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 es un revolucionario juego de rol por turnos con mecánicas en tiempo real únicas que hacen las batallas más inmersivas y adictivas de lo que jamás hayas visto. Explora un mundo de fantasía inspirado por la Francia de la Belle Époque en el que te enfrentarás a enemigos devastadores.
 
      
    
 En esta evolución de los JRPG, el combate por turnos cobra una nueva vida a través de las acciones en tiempo real. Crea configuraciones únicas para tus expedicionarios que se adapten a tu estilo de juego en función de su equipo, atributos, habilidades y sinergias entre personajes. Vive los combates de forma más activa: esquiva, bloquea y contraataca en tiempo real, encadena combos dominando los ritmos de ataque y ataca los puntos débiles de tus enemigos con un sistema de apuntado libre.
 
      
    
 A Gustave, Maelle y el resto de expedicionarios solo les queda un año de vida; únete a ellos y embarcaos en una misión a la desesperada para detener el ciclo de muerte de la Peintresse. Sigue el rastro de las expediciones previas y descubre cuál fue su destino. Conoce a los miembros de la expedición 33 mientras ellos aprenden a cooperar con todo en su contra.
 
      
    
 Explora un fascinante paraje habitado por adversarios inimaginables. Vaga por imponentes paisajes, desde la isla de Visages hasta el campo de batalla olvidado, descubriendo secretos y misiones ocultas durante la travesía. Encuentra valiosos aliados en criaturas de leyenda y recluta a compañeros especiales, accede a nuevas formas de viaje y descubre zonas secretas en el mapa del mundo.
 
 Experimenta el juego debut de Sandfall Interactive, desarrollado al completo en Unreal Engine 5 con gráficos despampanantes y una banda sonora conmovedora.

Édition numérique de luxe      L'Édition Deluxe comprend : 
   Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 - le jeu de base
   La collection « Fleurs » - six tenues et coupes de cheveux tirant leur inspiration des fleurs de Lumière, ainsi que six variantes de tenues supplémentaires de la gamme « Gommage », une par personnage.
   « Clair » : tenue personnalisée pour Maelle.
   « Obscur » : tenue personnalisée pour Gustave.  
 
  À propos du jeu      
    
 Une fois par an, la Peintresse se réveille. Sur son Monolithe, elle peint son nombre maudit. Et tous ceux plus âgés que cet âge partent en fumée. Année après année, ce nombre diminue et nous sommes toujours plus nombreux à être effacés. Demain, elle se réveillera pour peindre « 33 ». Et demain, nous partirons pour notre ultime mission : éliminer la Peintresse, pour que plus jamais elle ne peigne la mort.
 
 Nous sommes l'Expédition 33.
 
 Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 est un RPG au tour par tour révolutionnaire qui intègre des mécaniques de jeu en temps réel, pour rendre les combats plus immersifs et addictifs que jamais. Explorez un monde fantastique rappelant la France de la Belle Époque et peuplé d'ennemis dévastateurs.
 
      
    
 Dans cette évolution des JRPG, des actions en temps réel viennent enrichir le principe du combat au tour par tour. Créez des builds uniques correspondant à votre style de jeu à partir de vos attributs, vos compétences et votre équipement tout en trouvant des synergies entre les membres de votre expédition. Accédez à une dimension active du combat : esquivez, parez et contrez en temps réel, enchaînez les combos en maîtrisant le rythme des attaques, et ciblez les points faibles de vos adversaires grâce à un système de visée libre. 
 
      
    
 Gustave, Maelle et leurs confrères d'expédition n'ont plus qu'une année à vivre. Rejoignez-les dans leur quête de la dernière chance afin d'interrompre le cycle mortel de la Peintresse. Suivez les traces des expéditions précédentes et découvrez leur sort. Faites connaissance avec les membres de l'Expédition 33 qui apprennent à coopérer envers et contre tout.
 
      
    
 Explorez un royaume enchanteur peuplé d'adversaires surréalistes. Parcourez des paysages stupéfiants, depuis l'île de Visages jusqu'au Champ de bataille oublié, en découvrant chemin faisant des secrets et des quêtes cachées. Alliez-vous à des créatures légendaires et recrutez des compagnons spéciaux, accédez à de nouveaux moyens de déplacement et découvrez des zones secrètes sur la carte du monde.
 
 Découvrez le premier titre de Sandfall Interactive, réalisé intégralement sous Unreal Engine 5 avec de sublimes graphismes et une bande-son bouleversante.

Digitale Deluxe-Edition      Die Deluxe Edition enthält: 
   Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 - Das Grundspiel
   Die "Blumen"-Kollektion - Sechs Outfits und Frisuren, die von den Blumen in Lumière inspiriert sind, sowie sechs zusätzliche "Gommage"-Outfitvarianten (eine für jeden spielbaren Charakter)
   "Clair" - Ein maßgeschneidertes Outfit für Maelle
   "Obscur" - Ein maßgeschneidertes Outfit für Gustave  
 
  Infos zum Spiel      
    
 Einmal im Jahr erwacht die Malerin und malt auf ihrem Monolithen. Sie malt ihre verfluchte Zahl. Und jeder, der älter ist als dieses Alter, verwandelt sich in Rauch und verschwindet. Jahr für Jahr wird die Zahl kleiner und mehr von uns werden ausgelöscht. Morgen wird sie erwachen und „33“ malen. Und morgen brechen wir zu unserer letzten Mission auf. Zerstöre die Malerin, damit sie nie wieder den Tod malen kann.
 
 Wir sind die Expedition 33.
 
 Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 ist ein bahnbrechendes rundenbasiertes Rollenspiel mit einzigartigen Echtzeit-Elementen und fesselnden Kämpfen. Erkunde eine vom Frankreich der Belle Époque inspirierte Fantasiewelt, in der du gegen gewaltige Feinde kämpfst.
 
      
    
 In dieser Weiterentwicklung des JRPG-Genres erweitern Echtzeit-Aktionen den Kern der rundenbasierten Kämpfe. Stelle deine Entdecker mit Hilfe von Ausrüstung, Werten, Fertigkeiten und Charaktersynergien so zusammen, dass sie zu deinem Spielstil passen. Erweitere den Kampf mit einer aktiven Komponente: Weiche aus, pariere und kontere in Echtzeit, führe Kombos durch, indem du Angriffsrhythmen beherrschst, und nimm mit dem „Freies Zielen“-System die Schwachpunkte deiner Gegner ins Visier. 
 
      
    
 Du hast nur noch ein Jahr zu leben und begleitest Gustave, Maelle und ihre Entdeckerkollegen auf ihrem verzweifelten Weg, den Todeskreislauf der Malerin zu durchbrechen. Folge den Spuren früherer Expeditionen und entdecke ihr Schicksal. Lerne die Mitglieder der Expedition 33 kennen, während sie versuchen, zusammen das Unmögliche zu überstehen.
 
      
    
 Erforsche ein zauberhaftes Reich, das von surrealen Gegnern bevölkert wird. Wandere durch atemberaubende Landschaften, von der Insel von Visages bis zum Vergessenen Schlachtfeld, und entdecke auf deiner Reise Geheimnisse und versteckte Quests. Finde legendäre Kreaturen – sie sind deine Verbündeten des Glücks. Rekrutiere besondere Gefährten, um Zugang zu neuen Reisemethoden zu erhalten und geheime Gebiete auf der Weltkarte zu entdecken.
 
 Erlebe das Debüt-Spiel von Sandfall Interactive, das komplett in der Unreal Engine 5 erschaffen wurde – mit atemberaubender Grafik und einem herzergreifenden Soundtrack.

Edição Deluxe digital      A Deluxe Edition inclui: 
   Jogo base Clair Obscur: Expedition 33
   A coleção "Flowers". Seis fatos e penteados inspirados nas Flores de Lumière, assim como seis variantes adicionais "Gommage". Um para cada personagem jogável.
   "Clair" - Um fato exclusivo para Maelle
   "Obscur" - Um fato exclusivo para Gustave  
 
  Acerca do jogo      
     "Anos após ano, ela apaga-nos." Uma vez por ano, a Paintress desperta e pinta sobre o seu monólito. Pinta o seu número amaldiçoado. Todos cuja idade é maior que o número desaparecem em fumo. Ano após ano, o número decresce e aumentam os que somos apagados. Amanhã, ela vai despertar e pintar "33". Amanhã, partimos na nossa missão final: destruir a Paintress, para que nunca mais pinte a morte.
 
 Somos Expedition 33.
 
 Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 é um RPG por turnos inovador, com mecânicas em tempo real únicas, o que cria as batalhas mais imersivas e viciantes de sempre. Explora um mundo de fantasia inspirado na Belle Époque francesa, onde podes combater contra inimigos devastadores.
 
      
     Combate por turnos reativo Nesta evolução dos JRPG, as ações em tempo real potenciam a emoção dos combates por turnos. Cria configurações únicas para os teus exploradores para que se adaptem ao teu estilo de jogo através de equipamentos, estatísticas, habilidades e sinergias entre personagens. Abre uma nova dimensão ativa em combate. Esquiva-te, defende-te e contra-ataca em tempo real. Domina o ritmo dos ataques para realizar combinações e atinge os pontos fracos dos inimigos com um sistema de mira livre. 
 
      
     "O amanhã vai chegar" Com apenas um ano para viver, junta-te a Gustave, Maelle e aos seus companheiros de expedição numa jornada desesperada para quebrar o ciclo da morte da Paintress. Segue o rasto das expedições anteriores e descobre o destino delas. Conhece melhor os membros da Expedition 33 à medida que aprendem a trabalhar em conjunto contra probabilidades impossíveis.
 
      
     Um mundo assombrosamente belo Explora um reino encantado e cheio de adversários surreais. Deslumbra-te com paisagens de tirar o fôlego, da Ilha de Visages até ao Campo de Batalha Esquecido, onde não faltam segredos e missões escondidas para descobrir. Alia-te a criaturas lendárias e recruta companheiros especiais, descobre novas formas de viajar e encontra áreas secretas espalhadas pelo mundo.
 
 Descobre o jogo de estreia da Sandfall Interactive, totalmente concebido com Unreal Engine 5, com gráficos espantosos e uma banda sonora emocionante.

デジタルデラックスエディション      
  デラックスエディションに含まれるもの：  
    『Clair Obscur: Expedition 33』本編
    “Flowers（花）”コレクション - ルミエールの花をテーマにした6つの衣装と髪型に加え、6つの“Gommage（抹消）”衣装バリエーションを追加。各プレイアブルキャラクターに1つずつ。
    “Clair（クレール）” - マエル用のカスタム衣装
    “Obscur（オブスキュール）” - ギュスターヴ用のカスタム衣装
   
 
  ゲームについて      
    
 年に一度ペイントレスが目を覚まし、モノリスに描き出す。それは呪いの数字。その年齢を超える人々は煙となり、消え去ってしまう。年々、呪いの数字は小さくなり、犠牲となった人の数が積み上がっていく。明日、彼女は目覚めて「33」を描き、私たちもまた最後の任務に赴く。ペイントレスを倒し、二度と死を描けないようにしなければならない。
 
 第33遠征隊の旅が今始まる。
 
 革新的なターン制RPG『Clair Obscur: Expedition 33』では、リアルタイムで進行する独自のシステムが、これまでにない没入感を戦闘にもたらす。ベル・エポックのフランスをモチーフにした幻想的な世界を旅し、恐るべき敵と戦おう。
 
      
    
 JRPGを進化させた本作では、ターン制バトルの核となる要素がリアルタイムアクションでさらに発展。装備、ステータス、スキル、キャラクターの連携を組み合わせて、プレイスタイルに合う自分だけの遠征隊を編成しよう。戦闘中にアクティブディメンションを開き、リアルタイムで回避、パリィ、カウンターを駆使しよう。攻撃のリズムを掴めばチェーンコンボを繰り出せ、フリーエイムで敵の弱点を狙うこともできる。 
 
      
    
 残されたのはわずか1年。ギュスターヴやマエル、遠征隊の仲間たちとともに決死の旅へ。ペイントレスによる死の輪廻を終わらせなければならない。これまでの遠征隊の足跡をたどり、その運命を明らかにせよ。第33遠征隊の仲間の特性を把握し、ゼロに等しい勝機を掴むべく、ともに力を合わせよう。
 
      
    
 謎めいた敵がはびこる魅惑の世界を探索。ヴィサージュ島から忘れ去られた戦場にいたるまで、驚くべき世界を旅して秘密や隠しクエストを見つけだそう。伝説の生物の中には、運命をともにする仲間になってくれる者もいる。特別な仲間を味方につけて新たな移動手段を獲得し、ワールドマップに隠された秘密のエリアを発見しよう。
 
 『Clair Obscur: Expedition 33』はSandfall Interactiveによる初タイトル。Unreal Engine 5を用いた美しいグラフィック、心に響くサウンドと楽曲を体験しよう。

Digital Deluxe Edition      The Deluxe Edition includes: 
   Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Base Game
   The “Flowers” Collection - Six outfits and hairstyles inspired by the Flowers of Lumière, along with six additional “Gommage” outfit variations. One for each playable character.
   “Clair” - A custom outfit for Maelle
   “Obscur” - A custom outfit for Gustave  
 
  About the Game          Once a year, the Paintress wakes and paints upon her monolith. Paints her cursed number. And everyone past that age turns to smoke and fades away. Year by year, that number ticks down and more of us are erased. Tomorrow she’ll wake and paint “33.” And tomorrow we depart on our final mission - Destroy the Paintress, so she can never paint death again. 
  
  We are Expedition 33.
  
  Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 is a ground-breaking turn-based RPG with unique real-time mechanics, making battles more immersive and addictive than ever. Explore a fantasy world inspired by Belle Époque France in which you battle devastating enemies.
  
          In this evolution of JRPGs, real-time actions enhance the heart of turn-based combat. Craft unique builds for your Expeditioners that fit your playstyle via gear, stats, skills, and character synergies. Open an active dimension in combat - dodge, parry, and counter in real time, chain combos by mastering attack rhythms, and target enemy weak points using a free aim system. 
  
          With only one year left to live, join Gustave, Maelle, and their fellow Expeditioners as they embark upon a desperate quest to break the Paintress’ cycle of death. Follow the trail of previous expeditions and discover their fate. Get to know the members of Expedition 33 as they learn to work together against impossible odds.
  
          Explore an enchanting realm populated by surreal adversaries. Wander through breathtaking landscapes, from the Island of Visages to the Forgotten Battlefield, discovering secrets and hidden quests along the way. Find allies of fortune in creatures of legend. Recruit special companions to access new travel methods and discover secret areas in the World Map.
  
  Experience the debut game from Sandfall Interactive, fully realized in Unreal Engine 5 with stunning graphics and a heartbreaking soundtrack.

title: Bulwark Evolution: Falconeer Chronicles
description:
INTRODUCING A CREATIVE SANDBOX BUILDING GAME: Bulwark is about designing your fortress and expanding it into an empire. 

Story: You are in charge of the last remnants of free people on the Ursee, tasked with building a new home. Carve your path onto a world, tower by tower, wall by wall, sculpting from the daunting cliffs and perilous waters of an unforgiving landscape that refuses to be tamed.

Game goals: Design fantastic ocean fortress settlements. Progress is simple, grow the populations of various factions and you will progress on their Soultrees. Unlocking commanders and captains that may work for you, unlocking new ships, units and abilities. 

Play Your Way: 

Bulwark - Explore the Great Ursee as you build your grand civilisation. Scavenge for resources,create trade routes and strike alliances with other factions scattered across the waves as you balance negotiation and conflict to grow your settlement. 

Freebuild - Enjoy a cosy ‘Freebuild Mode’, devoid of the conflict and challenges present in standard play, you can sketch and experiment without the need for resources, building without limits. 
  
Total Conquest - War has come to the Great Ursee. You start at war with every faction, diplomacy is disabled and the frequency and scale of raids is ramped up. It is no longer enough to just build - now you must survive.  

Building Resources: Wood, stone and Iron aren’t stored or tallied up, the only thing that counts is distance, not cost. You transport resources along your network of towers as well as trading routes over the sea. Towers and walls within range of the resource can be upgraded and built for free, those out of range cannot.  

Splinters: The currency that powers diplomacy, army building, buying new locations and unique buildings is separate from resources, it runs on a currency called, Splinters. You gain these through population growth, trade with other factions or as rewards from combat. 

Challenge: The game challenges you to design and grow grand fortresses, often at little cost other than setting up trade routes for resources. As you grow you may invite in populations from other factions which unlock faction unique content from their “soultree”.  

But everybody hates everybody on the Ursee and doing so might lead to war or to loyal allies that merge with your empire. This sandbox builder has consequences!

PRESENTACIÓN DE UN CREATIVO JUEGO DE CONSTRUCCIÓN DE ARENAS: Bulwark consiste en diseñar tu fortaleza y expandirla hasta convertirla en un imperio. 
  
Historia: Estás a cargo de los últimos restos de gente libre en Ursee, con la tarea de construir un nuevo hogar. Labra tu camino en el mundo, torre a torre, muro a muro, esculpiendo los imponentes acantilados y las peligrosas aguas de un paisaje implacable que se niega a ser domado.
 
Objetivos del juego: Diseña fantásticos asentamientos de fortalezas oceánicas. Progresar es sencillo, haz crecer las poblaciones de varias facciones y progresarás en sus Soultrees. Desbloquea comandantes y capitanes que puedan trabajar para ti, desbloquea nuevos barcos, unidades y habilidades.
 
Juega a tu manera:   
  
Bulwark - Explora la Gran Urbe mientras construyes tu gran civilización. Busca recursos, crea rutas comerciales y establece alianzas con otras facciones dispersas por las olas mientras equilibras la negociación y el conflicto para hacer crecer tu asentamiento.
 
Freebuild - Disfruta de un acogedor «Modo Freebuild», desprovisto de los conflictos y desafíos presentes en el juego estándar, puedes esbozar y experimentar sin necesidad de recursos, construyendo sin límites. 
  
Conquista Total - La guerra ha llegado a la Gran Urbe. Empiezas en guerra con todas las facciones, la diplomacia está desactivada y la frecuencia y la escala de las incursiones han aumentado. Ya no basta con construir, ahora debes sobrevivir.  
  
Recursos de construcción: La madera, la piedra y el hierro no se almacenan ni se contabilizan, lo único que cuenta es la distancia, no el coste. Transportas recursos a lo largo de tu red de torres, así como rutas comerciales por el mar. Las torres y murallas dentro del alcance del recurso pueden ser mejoradas y construidas gratuitamente, las que están fuera del alcance no.  
  
Esquirlas: La moneda con la que funciona la diplomacia, la construcción de ejércitos, la compra de nuevas localizaciones y edificios únicos es distinta de los recursos, funciona con una moneda llamada Esquirlas. Las obtienes mediante el crecimiento de la población, el comercio con otras facciones o como recompensa de los combates. 
  
Desafío: El juego te reta a diseñar y hacer crecer grandes fortalezas, a menudo con poco coste aparte de establecer rutas comerciales para obtener recursos. A medida que creces puedes invitar a poblaciones de otras facciones que desbloquean contenido exclusivo de su «árbol de almas».  

Pero todo el mundo odia a todo el mundo en Ursee y hacerlo puede llevar a la guerra o a aliados leales que se fusionen con tu imperio. ¡Este sandbox builder tiene consecuencias!

INTRODUIRE UN JEU DE CONSTRUCTION CREATIF EN BOIS DE SABLE : Bulwark consiste à concevoir votre forteresse et à l'étendre pour en faire un empire. 

Histoire : Vous êtes à la tête des derniers vestiges d'un peuple libre sur l'Ursee, chargé de construire un nouveau foyer. Sculptez votre chemin dans un monde, tour par tour, mur par mur, à partir des falaises et des eaux dangereuses d'un paysage impitoyable qui refuse d'être apprivoisé. Il ne suffit plus de construire, il faut maintenant survivre.  

Objectifs du jeu : Concevoir de fantastiques forteresses océaniques. La progression est simple, développez les populations des différentes factions et vous progresserez sur leur arbre des âmes. Débloquez des commandants et des capitaines qui peuvent travailler pour vous, débloquez de nouveaux navires, unités et capacités. 
  
Jouez à votre façon :   
  
Bulwark - Explorez le Grand Ourse et construisez votre grande civilisation. Cherchez des ressources, créez des routes commerciales et concluez des alliances avec d'autres factions disséminées sur les flots, tout en équilibrant négociations et conflits pour développer votre colonie. 
  
Construction libre - Profitez d'un mode de construction libre confortable, dépourvu des conflits et des défis présents dans le jeu standard. Vous pouvez dessiner et expérimenter sans avoir besoin de ressources, en construisant sans limites. 
  
Conquête totale - La guerre est arrivée dans le Grand Ourse. Vous entrez en guerre avec toutes les factions, la diplomatie est désactivée et la fréquence et l'ampleur des raids sont accrues. Il ne suffit plus de construire, il faut maintenant survivre.  

Ressources de construction : Le bois, la pierre et le fer ne sont pas stockés ni comptabilisés, la seule chose qui compte est la distance, pas le coût. Vous transportez les ressources le long de votre réseau de tours et des routes commerciales maritimes. Les tours et les murs à portée de la ressource peuvent être améliorés et construits gratuitement, ceux qui sont hors de portée ne le peuvent pas.  
 
Splinters : La monnaie qui alimente la diplomatie, la construction d'armée, l'achat de nouveaux emplacements et de bâtiments uniques est distincte des ressources, elle fonctionne avec une monnaie appelée Éclats. Vous obtenez ces éclats grâce à la croissance de la population, au commerce avec d'autres factions ou aux récompenses obtenues au combat. 
  
Défi : Le jeu vous met au défi de concevoir et de faire croître de grandes forteresses, souvent à peu de frais, si ce n'est l'établissement de routes commerciales pour les ressources. Au fur et à mesure que vous vous développez, vous pouvez inviter des populations d'autres factions qui débloquent un contenu unique à la faction à partir de leur « arbre d'âme ».  

Mais tout le monde déteste tout le monde sur l'Ursee et cela peut mener à la guerre ou à des alliés loyaux qui fusionnent avec votre empire. Ce constructeur de bac à sable a des conséquences !

EINFÜHRUNG EINES SANDBOX-BAUSPIELS: Bulwark dreht sich darum, deine Festung zu entwerfen und sie zu einem Imperium auszubauen.
   
Geschichte: Du bist verantwortlich für die letzten Überreste freier Menschen auf der Ursee, die mit dem Bau eines neuen Zuhauses beauftragt sind. Bahne dir deinen Weg in die Welt, Turm für Turm, Mauer für Mauer, und forme sie aus den bedrohlichen Klippen und gefährlichen Gewässern einer unbarmherzigen Landschaft, die sich nicht zähmen lässt. 
  
Spielziele:  Entwerfe fantastische Festungssiedlungen auf dem Ozean. Der Fortschritt ist einfach: Wachse die Populationen verschiedener Fraktionen und du wirst in ihren Seelenbäumen voranschreiten, indem du Kommandanten und Kapitäne freischaltest, die für dich arbeiten können, und neue Schiffe, Einheiten und Fähigkeiten freischaltest. 
  
Spiele auf deine Weise: Es gibt drei separate Spielmodi, die unterschiedliche Spielerlebnisse bieten. 
  
Bulwark - Erkunde die Große Ursee, während du deine große Zivilisation aufbaust. Plündere Ressourcen, errichte Handelsrouten und schließe Allianzen mit anderen Fraktionen, die über die Wellen verstreut sind, während du Verhandlung und Konflikt ausbalancierst, um deine Siedlung zu erweitern. 
  
Freier Aufbau: Genieße einen gemütlichen „Freier Aufbau“-Modus, frei von den Konflikten und Herausforderungen des Standardspiels; du kannst ohne Ressourcen skizzieren und experimentieren, ohne Einschränkungen bauen. 
  
Totale Eroberung: Der Krieg ist über die Große Ursee gekommen. Du beginnst im Krieg mit jeder Fraktion, Diplomatie ist deaktiviert und die Häufigkeit und das Ausmaß der Überfälle ist erhöht. Es reicht nicht mehr, nur zu bauen - jetzt musst du überleben. 
  
Baumaterialien: Holz, Stein und Eisen werden nicht gespeichert oder gezählt; das einzige, was zählt, ist die Entfernung, nicht die Kosten. Du transportierst Ressourcen entlang deines Turmnetzwerks sowie über Handelsrouten über das Meer. Türme und Mauern innerhalb der Reichweite der Ressource können kostenlos aufgerüstet und gebaut werden, außerhalb der Reichweite nicht. 
 
Splitter: Die Währung, die Diplomatie, Armeebau, den Kauf neuer Orte und einzigartiger Gebäude antreibt, ist von Ressourcen getrennt; sie läuft auf einer Währung namens Splitter. Du gewinnst sie durch Bevölkerungswachstum, Handel mit anderen Fraktionen oder als Belohnungen aus Kämpfen. 
  
Herausforderung: Das Spiel fordert dich heraus, großartige Festungen zu entwerfen und zu bauen, oft zu geringen Kosten, außer dem Einrichten von Handelsrouten für Ressourcen. Während du wächst, kannst du Bevölkerungen aus anderen Fraktionen einladen, was fraktionsspezifische Inhalte aus ihrem „Seelenbaum“ freischaltet. 

Aber jeder hasst jeden auf der Ursee und dies könnte zu Krieg oder loyalen Verbündeten führen, die sich deinem Imperium anschließen. Dieser Sandbox-Baumeister hat Konsequenzen!

INTRODUKTION AF ET KREATIVT SANDKASSEBYGNINGSSPIL: Bulwark handler om at designe din fæstning og udvide den til et imperium. 

Historie: Du har ansvaret for de sidste rester af frie mennesker på Ursee og har til opgave at bygge et nyt hjem. Skab din vej ind i en verden, tårn for tårn, mur for mur, formet af de skræmmende klipper og farlige farvande i et uforsonligt landskab, der nægter at lade sig tæmme. 
  
Spillets mål: Design fantastiske bosættelser med havfæstninger. Fremskridt er enkelt, få befolkningerne i de forskellige fraktioner til at vokse, og du vil gøre fremskridt på deres Soultrees. Lås op for kommandanter og kaptajner, der kan arbejde for dig, og lås op for nye skibe, enheder og evner. 
  
Spil på din måde: 

Bulwark - Udforsk Great Ursee, mens du opbygger din store civilisation. Søg efter ressourcer, skab handelsruter og indgå alliancer med andre fraktioner spredt ud over bølgerne, mens du balancerer forhandling og konflikt for at få din bosættelse til at vokse. 
  
Freebuild - Nyd den hyggelige »Freebuild Mode«, der er blottet for konflikter og udfordringer i standardspillet, hvor du kan skitsere og eksperimentere uden behov for ressourcer og bygge uden grænser. 
  
Total Conquest - Krigen er kommet til Great Ursee. Du starter i krig med alle fraktioner, diplomatiet er deaktiveret, og hyppigheden og omfanget af raids er øget. Det er ikke længere nok bare at bygge - nu skal du overleve.  
  
Byggeressourcer: Træ, sten og jern bliver ikke opbevaret eller talt op, det eneste, der tæller, er afstanden, ikke prisen. Du transporterer ressourcer langs dit netværk af tårne og handelsruter over havet. Tårne og mure inden for ressourcens rækkevidde kan opgraderes og bygges gratis, men ikke dem uden for rækkevidde.  
  
Splinters: Den valuta, der driver diplomati, hæropbygning, køb af nye steder og unikke bygninger, er adskilt fra ressourcer, den kører på en valuta kaldet Splinters. Du får dem gennem befolkningstilvækst, handel med andre fraktioner eller som belønning for kamp. 
  
Udfordring: Spillet udfordrer dig til at designe og udbygge store fæstninger, ofte uden andre omkostninger end at etablere handelsruter for ressourcer. Efterhånden som du vokser, kan du invitere befolkninger fra andre fraktioner, som låser op for fraktionsspecifikt indhold fra deres »soultree«.  

Men alle hader alle på Ursee, og det kan føre til krig eller til loyale allierede, der fusionerer med dit imperium. Denne sandkassebygger har konsekvenser!

INTRODUZIONE DI UN GIOCO DI COSTRUZIONE CREATIVO: Bulwark consiste nel progettare la propria fortezza ed espanderla in un impero. 

Storia: Sei a capo degli ultimi resti di un popolo libero sull'Ursee, con il compito di costruire una nuova casa. Scolpisci il tuo cammino in un mondo, torre dopo torre, muro dopo muro, scolpendo le scoraggianti scogliere e le pericolose acque di un paesaggio spietato che si rifiuta di essere domato. 
  
Obiettivi del gioco: Progettare fantastici insediamenti-fortezza sull'oceano. I progressi sono semplici: fai crescere le popolazioni delle varie fazioni e progredirai nelle loro Soultre. Sbloccare comandanti e capitani che possono lavorare per voi, sbloccare nuove navi, unità e abilità. 
  
Gioca a modo tuo:   
  
Bulwark - Esplora il Grande Ursee mentre costruisci la tua grande civiltà. Cercate risorse, create rotte commerciali e stringete alleanze con altre fazioni sparse tra le onde, bilanciando negoziati e conflitti per far crescere il vostro insediamento. 
  
Freebuild - Godetevi l'accogliente modalità “Freebuild”, priva dei conflitti e delle sfide presenti nel gioco standard: potrete abbozzare e sperimentare senza bisogno di risorse, costruendo senza limiti. 
  
Conquista totale - La guerra è arrivata nel Grande Ursee. Si parte in guerra con ogni fazione, la diplomazia è disattivata e la frequenza e la portata delle incursioni sono aumentate. Non basta più costruire, ora bisogna sopravvivere.  
  
Risorse per la costruzione: Il legno, la pietra e il ferro non vengono immagazzinati né conteggiati: l'unica cosa che conta è la distanza, non il costo. Le risorse vengono trasportate lungo la rete di torri e le rotte commerciali sul mare. Le torri e le mura che si trovano nel raggio d'azione della risorsa possono essere potenziate e costruite gratuitamente, quelle che si trovano fuori dal raggio d'azione no.  
  
Schegge: La valuta che alimenta la diplomazia, la costruzione dell'esercito, l'acquisto di nuove località e di edifici unici è separata dalle risorse e si basa su una valuta chiamata Schegge. Si ottengono attraverso la crescita della popolazione, il commercio con altre fazioni o come ricompensa per i combattimenti. 
  
Sfida: Il gioco vi sfida a progettare e a far crescere grandi fortezze, spesso con costi minimi se non la creazione di rotte commerciali per le risorse. Man mano che si cresce, si possono invitare popolazioni di altre fazioni, che sbloccano contenuti esclusivi della fazione dal loro “albero dell'anima”.  

Ma tutti odiano tutti sull'Ursee e questo può portare alla guerra o ad alleati fedeli che si fondono con il vostro impero. Questo costruttore di sandbox ha delle conseguenze!

brief:
INTRODUCING A CREATIVE SANDBOX BUILDING GAME: Bulwark is about designing your fortress and expanding it into an empire. 

Story: You are in charge of the last remnants of free people on the Ursee, tasked with building a new home. Carve your path onto a world, tower by tower, wall by wall, sculpting from the daunting cliffs and perilous waters of an unforgiving landscape that refuses to be tamed.

Game goals: Design fantastic ocean fortress settlements. Progress is simple, grow the populations of various factions and you will progress on their Soultrees. Unlocking commanders and captains that may work for you, unlocking new ships, units and abilities. 

Play Your Way: 

Bulwark - Explore the Great Ursee as you build your grand civilisation. Scavenge for resources,create trade routes and strike alliances with other factions scattered across the waves as you balance negotiation and conflict to grow your settlement. 

Freebuild - Enjoy a cosy ‘Freebuild Mode’, devoid of the conflict and challenges present in standard play, you can sketch and experiment without the need for resources, building without limits. 
  
Total Conquest - War has come to the Great Ursee. You start at war with every faction, diplomacy is disabled and the frequency and scale of raids is ramped up. It is no longer enough to just build - now you must survive.  

Building Resources: Wood, stone and Iron aren’t stored or tallied up, the only thing that counts is distance, not cost. You transport resources along your network of towers as well as trading routes over the sea. Towers and walls within range of the resource can be upgraded and built for free, those out of range cannot.  

Splinters: The currency that powers diplomacy, army building, buying new locations and unique buildings is separate from resources, it runs on a currency called, Splinters. You gain these through population growth, trade with other factions or as rewards from combat. 

Challenge: The game challenges you to design and grow grand fortresses, often at little cost other than setting up trade routes for resources. As you grow you may invite in populations from other factions which unlock faction unique content from their “soultree”.  

But everybody hates everybody on the Ursee and doing so might lead to war or to loyal allies that merge with your empire. This sandbox builder has consequences!

title: This Is the Police
description:
Dive into a deep story of corruption, crime and intrigue. Take the role of gritty Police Chief Jack Boyd, and come face to face with the ugly underbelly of Freeburg, a city spiraling the drain. Will Jack reach his retirement with a nice stack of bills, or will he end up broken ... or worse? 
 
 
 Manage your staff, respond to emergencies, and investigate crimes in a city on the brink of chaos. The mafia underworld maneuvers behind the scenes, sinking their claws ever deeper into the city, even as the mayor is ready to exploit every situation to his political advantage. 
 
 Choose your approach to each situation as it unfolds. Sometimes you’ll be responding to a developing crisis at a crime scene, or negotiating with Freeburg’s crime bosses. Sometimes you’ll find yourself dodging questions in the press room, or even the occasional cross-examination in the witness box. Can you keep this pressure cooker from exploding, at least for long enough to stash away a nice retirement nest egg? 
 
 
   Your mission is clear: make $500,000 in 180 days, before Jack Boyd reaches retirement. How? That’s up to you!  
   Decisions, decisions! This Is the Police is all about a dark story and how you react to it. Whatever you decide, your choices will influence the game – and the fate of Jack Boyd.  
   The Good, the Bad, and... the Ugly? The Chief of Freeburg's Police Department deals with all kind of people. It is up to you to find the bad guys, and decide how to deal with them.  
   Carry out your duties. As head of Freeburg PD, Jack deals with all sorts of challenges every day: responding to emergencies, managing his officers, defending the department against City Hall and a corrupt mayor, and much more.  
   Solve Investigations and gather evidence against the criminal gangs of Freeburg.  
   Deal with the competing powers of the city. Everyone offers you favors, and each one comes at a price.   
   Rich and fully voiced story: Jack Boyd is portrayed by Jon St. John, the voice of Duke Nukem.

Sumérgete en una profunda historia de corrupción, crimen e intrigas. Asume el papel del duro oficial de policía Jack Boyd y enfréntate a las entrañas de Freeburg, una ciudad en plena decadencia. ¿Se retirará Jack con una bonita suma de dinero? ¿Acabará sin blanca? ¿O algo peor?
 Experimenta una controvertida historia de corrupción, crimen e intriga. Gestiona tu equipo, responde a emergencias e investiga crímenes en una ciudad al borde del caos. La mafia maquina entre bambalinas, clavando sus garras en la ciudad mientras el alcalde explota cualquier situación para medrar en su carrera política.
 Elige cómo te enfrentarás a cada situación. A veces deberás plantar cara a una crisis en pleno escenario del crimen o negociar con los jefes del crimen de Freeburg. A veces te encontrarás esquivando preguntas en la sala de prensa, o incluso puede que seas interrogado en el estrado. ¿Podrás conseguir que no estalle esta olla a presión, por lo menos hasta que encuentres un nidito en el que retirar? ¿O quizás acabarás entre rejas... o algo peor?
 
   Tu misión está clara: consigue 500 000 $ en 180 días, antes de que Jack Boyd se retire. ¿Cómo? ¡Eso es cosa tuya!    Decisiones, decisiones, decisiones… La oscura historia de This is the Police se adaptará a ellas. Elijas lo que elijas, influirá en el juego... y en el destino de Jack Boyd.    El bueno, el feo… ¿y el malo? El jefe de policía de Freeburg trata con todo tipo de gente. De ti depende saber quiénes son los malos.    Cumple con tus tareas: como jefe de policía de Freeburg, Jack tiene que ocuparse de la rutina de comisaría: responder a emergencias, gestionar a sus hombres, pelear por el presupuesto…    Lleva a cabo investigaciones para conseguir pruebas contra las bandas criminales de Freeburg.    Trata con las diferentes fuerzas de la ciudad: el alcalde, la mafia, la iglesia, el sindicato... Todos te ofrecerán favores, pero siempre a un precio.     Doblaje completo en inglés a cargo del glorioso Jon St. John (la voz de Duke Nukem).

Plongez dans un récit intense mêlant corruption, délits et manœuvres politiques. Incarnez Jack Boyd, l'implacable directeur de la police de Freeburg, et explorez la face obscure d'une ville au bord du chaos. Jack partira-t-il à la retraite avec un bon magot ou finira-t-il fauché... voire pire ?
 Gérez vos équipes, faites face aux situations de crise et menez l'enquête dans les rues d'une ville qui sombre dans la déchéance. La pègre mafieuse étend son emprise tentaculaire à tous les secteurs de la ville et même le maire n'hésitera pas à tirer profit de toute situation pouvant lui apporter un avantage politique.
 Choisissez judicieusement comment vous réagirez face aux évènements auxquels vous serez confrontés. Parfois, vous devrez intervenir dans le feu de l'action pour sécuriser une scène de crime ou négocier avec les barons du crime de Freeburg. D'autres fois, il vous faudra esquiver les questions dans la salle de presse, voire vous soumettre à un contre-interrogatoire sur le banc des témoins. Saurez-vous gérer la pression suffisamment longtemps pour toucher le pactole avant de partir à la retraite ? Ou terminerez-vous vos jours fauché, derrière les barreaux, voire d'une mort violente... ?
 
   Votre mission est claire : accumuler 500 000 $ en 180 jours, avant que Jack Boyd ne parte à la retraite. Comment ? À vous de décider !    Des choix cornéliens et des dilemmes moraux. Vivez une histoire sombre dans laquelle chaque acte peut être lourd de conséquences, pour les autres comme pour vous-même.    Le bon, la brute ou le truand ? En tant que chef du département de police de Freeburg, vous rencontrerez toutes sortes de personnages. Saurez-vous faire preuve de discernement ?    Faites votre devoir ! Chaque jour apporte son lot de défis : répondre aux appels d'urgence, gérer vos officiers, se battre pour obtenir plus de budget...    Lancez et résolvez les enquêtes en découvrant les preuves qui vous permettront d'accabler les gangs criminels de Freeburg.    Manœuvrez avec les différents pouvoirs de ville. Le maire, la mafia, le clergé, les syndicats : beaucoup de gens peuvent vous aider, mais toute faveur à un prix.     Entièrement doublé, avec le talentueux Jon St. John (la voix de Duke Nukem...).

This Is the Police verwebt die Genres Strategie und Adventure miteinander. In der Rolle des grantigen Polizeichefs Jack Boyd taucht der Spieler ein in die dunklen Abgründe der Stadt Freeburg. 
 
 Eine mitreißende und kontroverse Geschichte über Korruption, Kriminalität, Macht und politische Intrigen erwartet dich. Doch das Tagesgeschäft darf nicht ruhen: Manage deine Angestellten, kümmere dich um Notrufe und kläre die schlimmsten Verbrechen in einer Stadt am Rande des Chaos auf. Die Mafia zieht in der Unterwelt die Fäden, schlägt ihre Klauen immer tiefer in das Fleisch der Stadt und der Bürgermeister hat nichts Besseres zu tun, als jede Gelegenheit für seine eigenen Ränkespiele zu missbrauchen. 
 
 Entscheide, wie du Krisen bewältigst: Mal musst du eine heraufziehende Katastrophe während eines Einsatzes verhindern oder bei Verhandlungen mit den Unterwelt-Bossen von Freeburg Kopf und Kragen riskieren. Mal sitzt du im Presseraum, im Kreuzverhör der Reporter, mal sogar im Zeugenstand vor Gericht. Kannst du den Druck aus dem Kessel nehmen und verhindern, dass er explodiert … zumindest solange, bis du dir ein nettes Finanzpolster für den Ruhestand zugelegt hast? Vielleicht landest du gar im Gefängnis – oder dir widerfährt noch Schlimmeres...
 
   Entscheidungen, Entscheidungen, Entscheidungen - This Is the Police dreht sich ganz um die düstere Geschichte von Jack Boyd und wie Du sie bestreitest. Was auch immer du entscheidest, es beeinflußt dein Spiel - und Jacks Schicksal.   
   Schurken, Gauner und Ganoven. Der Polizeichef von Freeburg bekommt es mit jeder Menge zwielichtiger Gestalten zu tun. Es liegt an dir, die wirklich bösen zu erkennen.  
   Erledige deine Pflicht: Als Chef der Polizei von Freeburg muss sich Jack ums Tagesgeschäft kümmern. Notrufe beantworten, die Tagesabläufe seiner Beamten koordinieren, ums Budget feilschen ...   
   Beginne und löse Fälle, indem du Beweise sammelst und die Taten rekonstruierst. Auch die organisierten Gangs kannst du nur mit Beweisen zerschlagen.  
   Werde mit den Mächtigen der Stadt fertig: Der Bürgermeister, die Mafia, die Kirche, die Gewerkschaften. Jeder wird dir einen Gefallen anbieten, aber alles hat seinen Preis ...   
   Komplett vertonte und tiefgreifende Story: Jack Boyd wird brillant gesprochen vom einzigartigen Jon St. John (der Stimme von Duke Nukem).

"陰謀と犯罪に満ちた物語を楽しもう。プレイヤーは肝の据わった警察署長ジャック・ボイドとなり、悪循環の一途を辿るフリーバーグ市の裏に潜む卑劣な勢力と対決する。果たしてジャックは退職までに大金を稼げるか、それとも破産してしまうのか？いや、破産するだけならまだいいが…？
 
 警官の出動を管理し、緊急事態に対応し、混沌の縁にある都市の犯罪を捜査しよう。暗黒街のマフィアは市を裏側から操作し、その影響力を高めていく。その一方で、市長はありとあらゆる手段を使って自らの政治的利益を図ろうと手ぐすね引いている。
 
 事件が発生したら、状況に応じてアプローチを選んでいこう。時には事件現場で危機的局面に対応しなければならないこともあれば、フリーバーグ市の犯罪組織のボスと交渉を行わなければならないこともある。そのほかにも記者室で記者からの質問をかわしたり、たまには法廷で反対尋問に答えるなどという状況も発生する。署長ジャック・ボイドは様々な事態の暴発を抑えておけるか？少なくとも、たっぷりの退職金を稼いで引退するまでは…"
 
   目標は明確だ。ジャック・ボイドが定年を迎えるまでの180日で50万ドルを稼ぐこと。方法は問わない。
   決断に次ぐ決断！汚職の道へ落ちていくストーリーにどう応えるか、それが『This Is the Police』の世界だ。どのような決断を下すにしろ、あなたの選択がゲームの展開、そしてジャック・ボイドの運命を左右する。
   善玉、悪玉、そして…卑劣漢？フリーバーグ市の警察署長はありとあらゆる人間に対処しなければならない。悪玉を見極め、どのような対応を取るか。全てはプレイヤー次第だ。
   職務遂行のためにはありとあらゆることを行わねばならない。フリーバーグ警察署長のジャックには、毎日様々な試練が降りかかってくる。緊急事態への出動、人員の管理、市議会と汚職にまみれた市長から警察を守ることなど、やるべきことは多岐にわたる。
   事件を解決してフリーバーグ市を食い物にするマフィアによる犯罪の証拠を集めていこう。
   市には様々な勢力がある。警察署長に寄せられるうまい話には、それぞれに裏がある。
   フルボイスで語られるストーリー：ジャック・ボイドの声はデュークニューケムのジョン・セント・ジョンが担当。

Jack Boyd, beloved police chief of Freeburg, has 180 days before he's forced to retire. But Jack won't be going out quietly. Over the next six months, he'll be going all out to fulfill a dream: earn half a million dollars, any way he can. That might be play money for a corrupt cop, but up until now, Jack has been playing by the book. Even with overtime, in six months he wouldn't make fifty grand. But a police chief has access to all sorts of… informal income. Bribes, weapons and drug sales, deals with the Mafia, skimming off the budget, kickbacks – you name it. And Jack is tired of playing nice. He's is ready for anything, but only you can decide how far he'll go.

《这就是警察（This Is the Police）》是Weappy Studio制作的一款冒险解谜游戏。这个游戏讲述的是一名警察在他退休之前他能在自己选择的路上走多远的故事。

不能见光的银行账户，赌桌上的扑克，赌徒们的道德底线...这些都将在游戏中得以体现，选择采用暴力来解决问题可能不单是罪犯们的选择。然而事情远没有这么简单，随着游戏的发展，当我们来到地下室的时候，钢锯、断线钳、汽车的电瓶以及那些照片...腐败和退休不是一回事，但对于主角来说，这是一次重要的选择。

你没有必要在这个游戏中太循规蹈矩，你完全可以在你退休之前干些"兼职"来让你能在退休的时候有足够的钱去环游世界；但就另一方面来说，你也可以选择单纯的领退休金生活。当然，无论你选哪一边，你现在还要继续去“执法”。在退休前的这段日子里找到你真正想要的吧。

Dive into a deep story of corruption, crime and intrigue. Take the role of gritty Police Chief Jack Boyd, and come face to face with the ugly underbelly of Freeburg, a city spiraling the drain. Will Jack reach his retirement with a nice stack of bills, or will he end up broken ... or worse? 
 
 
 Manage your staff, respond to emergencies, and investigate crimes in a city on the brink of chaos. The mafia underworld maneuvers behind the scenes, sinking their claws ever deeper into the city, even as the mayor is ready to exploit every situation to his political advantage. 
 
 Choose your approach to each situation as it unfolds. Sometimes you’ll be responding to a developing crisis at a crime scene, or negotiating with Freeburg’s crime bosses. Sometimes you’ll find yourself dodging questions in the press room, or even the occasional cross-examination in the witness box. Can you keep this pressure cooker from exploding, at least for long enough to stash away a nice retirement nest egg? 
 
 
   Your mission is clear: make $500,000 in 180 days, before Jack Boyd reaches retirement. How? That’s up to you!  
   Decisions, decisions! This Is the Police is all about a dark story and how you react to it. Whatever you decide, your choices will influence the game – and the fate of Jack Boyd.  
   The Good, the Bad, and... the Ugly? The Chief of Freeburg's Police Department deals with all kind of people. It is up to you to find the bad guys, and decide how to deal with them.  
   Carry out your duties. As head of Freeburg PD, Jack deals with all sorts of challenges every day: responding to emergencies, managing his officers, defending the department against City Hall and a corrupt mayor, and much more.  
   Solve Investigations and gather evidence against the criminal gangs of Freeburg.  
   Deal with the competing powers of the city. Everyone offers you favors, and each one comes at a price.   
   Rich and fully voiced story: Jack Boyd is portrayed by Jon St. John, the voice of Duke Nukem.

Immergiti in una storia di corruzione, crimine e intrighi. Assumerai il ruolo del grintoso capo della polizia Jack Boyd e ti troverai ad affrontare il lato oscuro di Freeburg, una città allo sbando. Riuscirà Jack ad andare in pensione con un bel gruzzolo in tasca oppure finirà in bancarotta… o qualcosa di peggio? 
 Addentrati in una controversa storia di corruzione, crimine e intrighi politici. Gestisci il tuo staff, rispondi alle emergenze e indaga sui crimini di una città sull’orlo del caos. La criminalità organizzata muove i fili dietro le quinte, affondando gli artigli sempre più a fondo nella città, mentre il sindaco è pronto a sfruttare ogni situazione per il proprio vantaggio politico. 
 Decidi con quale approccio affrontare qualunque situazione si presenti. A volte, ti troverai a risolvere una crisi sulla scena di un crimine o a negoziare con i boss della mafia di Freeburg. Altre volte, dovrai eludere qualche domanda in sala stampa o persino affrontare un esame incrociato dal banco dei testimoni. Riuscirai a evitare che questa pentola a pressione esploda, almeno finché non avrai messo da parte un bel gruzzolo per la pensione? Oppure finirai tu stesso dietro le sbarre… o anche peggio?
 
   La tua missione è chiara: ottieni 500.000 $ in 180 giorni, prima che Jack Boyd vada in pensione. Come? A te la scelta!    Decisioni, decisioni, decisioni: This Is the Police si incentra su una storia dai risvolti inquietanti e sul tuo modo di affrontarla. Ogni tua decisione influenzerà il gioco e la sorte di Jack Boyd.    Il buono, il butto... il cattivo? Il capo della polizia di Freeburg ha a che fare con gente di ogni tipo. Spetterà a te mettere in riga i cattivi ragazzi.    Fai il tuo dovere: come capo della polizia di Freeburg, Jack deve occuparsi della routine quotidiana - rispondere alle emergenze, gestire gli agenti, lottare col budget…    Avvia e risolvi le indagini e ottieni le prove necessarie sulle bande criminali di Freeburg.    Fai i conti con tutte le figure autoritarie della città: il sindaco, la mafia, la Chiesa, i sindacati. Ognuno ti offrirà un favore, ma tutto ha un prezzo…    Completamente doppiato dal magnifico Jon St. John (la voce di Duke Nukem).

title: Kenshi
description:
A free-roaming squad based RPG focusing on open-ended sandbox gameplay features rather than a linear story. Be a trader, a thief, a rebel, a warlord, an adventurer, a farmer, a slave, or just food for the cannibals. 
 
    
 
 Research new equipment and craft new gear. Purchase and upgrade your own buildings to use as safe fortified havens when things go bad, or use them to start up a business. Aid or oppose the various factions in the world while striving for the strength and wealth necessary to simply survive in the harsh desert. Train your men up from puny victims to master warriors. Carry your wounded squad mates to safety and get them all home alive. FEATURES 
       
  Freeform gameplay in a seamless game world  in the largest single-player RPG world since Daggerfall, stretching over 870 square kilometers. The game will never seek to limit you or restrict your personal play style. 
 
       
  Custom design as many characters as you want  and build up a whole squad to fight for you. Characters will grow and become stronger with experience, not just in their stats but their appearance too. 
 
       
  Build a base  where you can research new technologies, upgrade your defences and craft new gear. 
 
    
  Original take on the RTS-RPG hybrid genre.  No "hero" characters with artificially stronger stats than everybody else- Every character and NPC you meet is potentially an equal, and has a name, a life. 
 
    
  You are not the chosen one.  You're not great and powerful. You don't have more 'hitpoints' than everyone else. You are not the center of the universe, and you are not special. Unless you work for it.
 
    
  Purchase and upgrade your own buildings  to use as safe fortified havens when things go bad, or use them to start up a business. 
 
    
  Variation and possibilities of gameplay.  Be good, be evil, be a businessman, be a thief, live in a town, live in the desert, travel alone, travel in hordes, build a fortress, raze a city. Devote yourself to freeing slaves, or maybe end up a slave yourself. 
 
    
  Dynamic, ever changing world.  Support or hinder whoever you wish, or keep to yourself, the world won't stop moving. This is not just a "game", you are living and surviving in a simulated world.
 
    
  Get captured by cannibals and eaten alive , or sold off by slavers and forced to work in the mines. These are not scripted events, just a regular part of this chaotic world that ruins your life by chance. Anything can happen, yet anything can be overcome if you have the strength. 
 
    
  Absolutely no Level-scaling.  The world does not level up along with you, and the shops don't change their inventory to only items matching your level. At the start of the game almost everyone will be stronger than you, and survival will always be a struggle. The game won't hold your hand or help you when you're down. 
 
    
  Realistic medical system that affects gameplay.  A character with a wounded leg will limp or crawl and slow the party down, wounded arms means you must use your sword one-handed or not at all. Severe injuries will result in amputees needing robotic limb replacements. Blood loss means you can pass out, and the blood will attract predators. A character’s stats are affected by equipment, encumbrance, blood loss, injuries and starvation. 
 
    
  Intelligent AI  that allows for characters to reason and work towards long-term goals and desires. Squads work together and carry their wounded to safety. Characters can be setup to take care of micromanagement for you and run production in your base. 
 
    
  Aid or oppose the various factions  in the world while striving for the strength and wealth necessary to simply survive in the harsh environment. 
 
    
  Independently developed  with no design influences, or alterations dictated by men in gray suits who have never played a game before in their lives. 
 
    
  Original game world.  There are no fantasy-knock-off cliches. No magic.

localized_description.text:
款以自由行动小分队为基础的角色扮演RPG类游戏，专注于开放式的沙盒游戏功能而非线性故事。选择成为商人、小偷、反叛者、军阀、冒险者、农民、奴隶或是食人族的牙祭。
 
    
 
 探索新设备，锻造新装备。购买并升级您的自有建筑，在形势恶化时使用其充当安全加固的避难所，或使用其开始创业。帮助或对抗世界内各种各样的帮派，同时争取在艰苦的沙漠中生存所需的力量与财富。训练您的角色使其从弱小的受害者逐渐变为强大的战士。将受伤的小分队伙伴带到安全地点，并让他们全部活着回家。 特点  
        
 款具有无缝游戏世界的自由游戏，是自匕首雨（Daggerfall）以来最大的单人RPG类世界，面积超过870平方公里。此游戏永远不会限制您的个人游戏风格。
 
       
 根据您的需要设计尽可能多的角色，并建立一个完整的小分队为你而战。角色会随着经验的增长而变强，这不仅仅体现在他们的状态数据中，外表也是。
 
    
 首次采用了RTS-RPG的混合体裁。没有人工设置成比其他人拥有更强状态的“英雄”角色。——您遇到的每个角色和NPC都可能是平等的，有名字、有生活。
 
    
 您并非天选之子。您并不强大。您也没有比他人更多的生命值。您并非宇宙的中心，也不特别。除非 您能努力挣得上述的一切。
 
       
 建造一个您能研究新科技的基地，升级您的防御并锻造新的装备。
 
    
 购买并升级您的自有建筑，在形势恶化时使用其充当安全加固的避难所，或使用其开始创业。
 
    
 游戏玩法的变化和可能性。为善、为恶，做商人、做小偷，住在城镇、住在沙漠，独自旅行、成群结队，建造堡垒、夷平城市。致力于解放奴隶，或者自己最终成为奴隶。
 
    
 个不断变化的世界。按您的想法支持或阻碍任何人，或坚守自我，世界可不会停止转动。这不仅仅是一个“游戏”，你正在模拟的世界中生活和生存。
 
    
 被食人族抓住并生吃，或是被奴隶主出售并在矿井中被强制干活。这些都不是事先计划好的事件，而是这一混乱世界内的日常部分，只是偶然地摧毁了您的生活。任何事情都有可能发生，但如果您有实力，任何事情也都能被克服。
 
    
 绝对不会有等级分配制度。世界不会与您同步升级，商店也不会将库存更改为仅储存与您的级别相匹配的商品。在游戏开始时，几乎每个人都比你强大，生存将永远是一场斗争。当你沮丧时，游戏可不会握住你的手或帮助你。
 
    
 影响游戏玩法的现实医疗系统。带有伤腿的角色会跛行或爬行并拖慢整个小分队的行动，受伤的手臂意味着您必须单手或根本不使用您的剑。严重受伤将导致截肢者需要机器人肢体以进行替换。失血意味着您会昏倒，而血液会吸引掠食者。角色状态将受设备、负重、失血、受伤和饥饿的影响。
 
    
 智能AI可允许角色分析并努力实现长期目标和护送。小分队成员将一起工作，并将伤员护送至安全的地点。可以设置角色来为您进行微观管理并在您的基地中经营生产。
 
    
 帮助或对抗世界内各种各样的帮派，只不过需要争取在艰苦的环境中生存所需的力量与财富。
 
    
 完全独立的开发，未受任何设计的影响，也从不因那些穿着灰色西装、以前从未玩过游戏的男人们而改变。
 
    
 原始的游戏世界。没有阻挡幻想的老套剧情。也不会有魔法。
